title: Emre Can - Wikipedia
snippet: A season later, he was signed by Premier League club Liverpool for £9.75 million where he made over 150 appearances across all tiers of competition and would join Juventus in 2018. In 2020 he was loaned to Borussia Dortmund; a few weeks later he moved to the team under a permanent deal.

title: Borussia Dortmund holt Emre Can von Juventus Turin | Bundesliga
snippet: Wie der Verein am Dienstag vor dem 2:1-Sieg im Champions-League-Achtelfinale gegen Paris St. Germain bekannt gab, wird der von Juventus Turin zunächst ausgeliehene Nationalspieler im Sommer fest verpflichtet.

title: Emre Can: Borussia Dortmund complete permanent transfer with Juventus | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: Borussia Dortmund have signed Emre Can on a four-year deal after activating an option to make the midfielders loan from Juventus permanent.

title: Emre Can joins Borussia Dortmund on a permanent basis - Juventus
snippet: Turin, 18 February 2020 - Juventus ... provided by the contract, the obligation for the definitive acquisition of the registration rights of the player Emre Can by Borussia Dortmund GmbH & Co....

title: Emre Can joins Borussia Dortmund from Juventus on initial loan | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: Borussia Dortmund have signed Emre Can from Juventus on Deadline Day on an initial loan.
